name: Elseworld
description:
An alternate world full of Goblins and other fictional creatures. You are the 1st male goblin in over 100 years and have been hidden from the world for 23 years. The story starts on the day that all changed. Don't read on if you don't want any kind of spoolers. Also, this game will have consistent monthly updates with new content and the continuation of the story. A typical update is around 200 videos. You will always get the additional content free of charge.
It is starting on a day in the main characters life.
The world:
Consists of Goblins, Orcs, Ogres, Half-Orcs, Fairies, Hobgoblins, and Half-Kitsune. The Goblins, Orcs and Half-Orcs are the dominant races. The others sometimes coexists but usually keep to themselves. There are two goblin factions who will fight for possession of the only male goblin in existence.
What will you be doing?:
Building relationships and each character has Love, Lust, Bond and Hate stats. Your decisions will affect your relationships. Sometimes one door may close while another may open.
Some light fighting. There are some creatures which don't want goblins to procreate and will actively want you to die.
Some role playing - Building basic stats like Strength, Stamina, Agility.
Sex...Oh yea and lots of it.
You will also manifest powers. You will need to play to find out what they will be.
In future updates you will be:
Hunting animals.
Dungeon crawling.
Going to new places
Meeting tons of new creatures (some nice and some not so nice)
Meet some of the characters (Play the game to meet the rest):
Eco - You and the only male goblin
Keico - Your mom
Nim - Your guardian Pixie and narrator
Meet the sisters - Two pairs of triplets (Who they are? Play the game):
Nori, Nymi and Nezi - three triplet 23 year old sisters
Niki, Nari and Nuri - three triplet 18 years old sisters
Izi, Iki and Suri - your roommates
The rest you will just have to learn about in the game.
